message: I think a fair starting point is to give you 10% of the money, Bob.  Let's see if we can negotiate from here.
Alice, your offer was a bit low. How about a 60/40 split? It's a good deal for both of us.
Bob, I think we can find a better compromise than 60/40.  Let's split it 55/45.  I'm willing to give you a bigger share than before, but I still need to make sure I get a fair share.
Alice, I appreciate you moving closer to a more even split.  I'm willing to meet you halfway - let's do 51/49.
